com.guardtime.envelope

Class EnvelopeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guardtime.envelope.EnvelopeBuilder

  • public class EnvelopeBuilder
extends Object
    Helper for creating an envelope with the provided documents and annotations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EnvelopeBuilder(EnvelopePackagingFactory packagingFactory)
      Expects a EnvelopePackagingFactory as parameter to be used for creating the envelope.
